replies.author: 用Win8.1玩MC
replies.txt_content: 正版启动器会在 crash 后自动弹出 crash report。另外，新的正版启动器默认会用自己下载的 jre，而不是安装的 jre，从 \runtime\jre-x64\1.8.0_25\ 可以看出。你把崩溃以后弹出的东西发一下。

replies.author: 用Win8.1玩MC
replies.txt_content:
爽哈ung 发表于 2017-2-3 09:52
刚试，一样，不过字少一点
下面是我的原版从启动到关闭的正常日志，你是在 LWJGL Version: 2.9.4 后崩溃了，日志就断开了，而随后的是 Reloading ResourceManager: Default，应该是加载资源包，所以我想你可以把资源包重命名试试（来防止资源包在启动时被加载，如果没有请忽略，基本可以定位是显卡问题）[09:31:20] [Client thread/INFO]: Setting user: chenjunyu19
[09:31:31] [Client thread/INFO]: LWJGL Version: 2.9.4
[09:31:39] [Client thread/INFO]: Reloading ResourceManager: Default
[09:31:43] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Starting up SoundSystem...
[09:31:43] [Thread-5/INFO]: Initializing LWJGL OpenAL
[09:31:43] [Thread-5/INFO]: (The LWJGL binding of OpenAL.  For more information, see http://www.lwjgl.org)
[09:31:45] [Thread-5/INFO]: OpenAL initialized.
[09:31:45] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Sound engine started
[09:32:12] [Client thread/INFO]: Created: 1024x512 textures-atlas
[09:33:09] [Client thread/INFO]: Stopping!
[09:33:09] [Client thread/INFO]: SoundSystem shutting down...
[09:33:09] [Client thread/WARN]: Author: Paul Lamb, www.paulscode.com
复制代码
